definition: capital (of a country)
Kyoto, Japan
abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)
all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all
surname Du
capital city/metropolis

sentences.english: Still the cultural center of Japan, Kyoto is an absolute must-see.
sentences.chinese: 仍然是日本文化中心的京都是一个必游的景点。

sentences.english: Gion Matsuri, which is one of the most famous festivals in Japan, takes place in Kyoto, too.
sentences.chinese: 日本最有名庆典之一的祇园祭也在京都举行。

sentences.english: The gokagai of Kyoto are its five geisha districts, also known as hanamachi ("flower towns").
sentences.chinese: 京都的五花街是五大艺妓聚集区，也已花街闻名。

sentences.english: This is Shibuya crossing in Tokyo, rumored to be the busiest pedestrian intersection in the world.
sentences.chinese: 这是京都涉谷区，传说是世界上最忙碌的十字路口。

sentences.english: The old streets and shops in Sannen-zaka, Kyoto, still retain their original character. (Frank Carter/LPI)
sentences.chinese: 在京都三年坂，老街和商铺依然保持着原始面貌。

sentences.english: Several temples in Kyoto have seen their Buddha statues disappear in recent months.
sentences.chinese: 最近几个月，京都好几个寺庙均发生佛像丢失事件。

sentences.english: Kyoto used to be the capital of Japan.
The US plan, if approved, could replace the existing Kyoto protocol.
sentences.chinese: 如果美国的计划被通过，那它将代替京都议定书。

sentences.english: Recovery of pure consciousness actually find themselves living in the Heian Kyoto.
sentences.chinese: 恢复意识的纯发现自己竟身处平安时代的京都。

sentences.english: This is an image of one of Kyoto's maiko.
sentences.chinese: 这是一张京都舞姬的图片。

sentences.english: Unlike most of historic Kyoto, the government tightly controls access to Katsura.
sentences.chinese: 与大多数的历史性京都，政府严格控制进入桂。

sentences.english: At the pinnacle of the complex geisha ranking system are the grand dowagers of Kyoto.
sentences.chinese: 在复杂的艺妓等级系统的顶峰，是京都的“太夫”。
东京都中野区的震级为3级。

sentences.english: US petition drive towards ratifying the Kyoto Protocol.
sentences.chinese: 推进美国签署京都议定书的请愿书。

sentences.english: Experience was born in Tokyo, living in Chiba City, Sichuan cities.
sentences.chinese: 生于东京都，住在千叶县市川市。

sentences.english: Kyoto have full-bodied amorous feelings of Japan, Japanese mind hometown.
sentences.chinese: 京都具有浓郁的日本风情，是日本人心灵的故乡。
